events.message: Candidate John Doe has submitted his application for the Senior Software Engineer role, showcasing over 5 years of experience in backend development.
John's application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster after confirming his experience in software development and devops practices.
Recruiter Sarah Martinez has been assigned to manage John's application and coordinate the recruitment process for the engineering role.
Initial screening call completed with John, where he demonstrated a solid understanding of software architecture and relevant technologies.
John responded promptly to the screening feedback, expressing enthusiasm for the next step and confirming availability for a technical interview.
Technical interview with John has been scheduled for 2024-06-05 at 10:00 AM UTC to assess in-depth software engineering skills.
